item.title: Docker on Freebsd
item.description: Docker on FreeBSD is not an easy ride, several attempts failed to bring the popular container platform to this operating system. We have the outdated port, jetpack, and the popular Docker on Freebsd wiki article. But still, the process is not easy, and prone to failures. Jails is the popular choice to isolate applications in FreeBSD, it’s been a part of the operating system since FreeBSD 4.X, so it’s very robust and has a long story already.
